description: Defines an immutable class MenuItem representing a menu item that can be ordered, including methods for copying, serialization, and deserialization.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: An immutable data class representing a menu item with fields for id, name, description, price, availability, and category.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a copy of the MenuItem with specified fields overridden.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the MenuItem to a Map<String, dynamic>.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a MenuItem instance from a Map<String, dynamic>.
